Title: Relates to the procedure for filling a vacancy in the office of state senator or in the office of member of assembly
Summary: Relates to the procedure for filling a vacancy in the office of state senator or in the office of member of assembly; allows for independent nominating petitions to be presented and provides for a special election to be held forty-five days from the date of the governor making a proclamation for a special election.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the procedure to fill senate and assembly vacancies
